data.title: Dina Merrill
data.text:
AKA Nedenia Marjorie Hutton

Born: 9-Dec-1925

Birthplace: New York City

Died: 22-May-2017

Location of death: East Hampton, NY

Cause of death: unspecified

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor, Socialite

Party Affiliation: Republican

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: EF Hutton heiress and actress

Purchased the name (and what was left of) RKO Pictures in 1989.

Father: E. F. Hutton (financier, b. 7-Sep-1875, d. 11-Jul-1962)

Mother: Marjorie Merriweather Post (cereal heiress, b. 15-Mar-1887, d. 12-Sep-1973)

Husband: Stanley M. Rumbough, Jr. (Colgate heir, m. 26-Mar-1946, div. 1964, two sons, one daughter)

Son: David (d. 1973 boating accident)

Daughter: Nina Rumbough Roosenburg

Son: Stanley H. Rumbough

Husband: Cliff Robertson (actor, m. 22-Dec-1966, div. 1986, one daughter)

Daughter: Heather (d. 2007 cancer)

Husband: Ted Hartley (investment banker, m. 18-Nov-1989, until her death)

High School: Miss Porter's School

University: George Washington University (one year, dropped out)

Conservatory: American Academy of Dramatic Arts

RKO Radio Pictures

Member of the Board of Lehman Brothers

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Shade (21-Jun-2003) · Dina

The Glow (30-Aug-2002)

The Magnificent Ambersons (13-Jan-2002)

Mighty Joe Young (25-Dec-1998) · Society Woman

A Chance of Snow (7-Dec-1998)

Open Season (3-May-1996)

Suture (14-Sep-1993)

The Player (3-Apr-1992)

True Colors (15-Mar-1991)

Fear (15-Jul-1990)

Caddyshack II (22-Jul-1988) · Cynthia Young

Twisted (1986)

Anna to the Infinite Power (1983)

Just Tell Me What You Want (18-Jan-1980)

A Wedding (29-Aug-1978) · Antoinette Goddard

The Greatest (19-May-1977)

Running Wild (15-Aug-1973)

The Letters (6-Mar-1973)

I'll Take Sweden (2-Jun-1965) · Karin Granstedt

The Courtship of Eddie's Father (6-Mar-1963) · Rita Behrens

Twenty Plus Two (13-Aug-1961)

The Young Savages (24-May-1961) · Karin Bell

The Sundowners (8-Dec-1960) · Jean Halstead

Butterfield 8 (4-Nov-1960) · Emily Liggett

Operation Petticoat (5-Dec-1959) · Lt. Barbara Duran

Don't Give Up the Ship (3-Jul-1959)

A Nice Little Bank That Should Be Robbed (1-Dec-1958) · Margie Solitaire

Desk Set (1-May-1957)
